title: 20 Gems We Unearthed From Nordstrom’s Spring Sale
description: Snag these coveted markdowns before they’re gone.
excerpt: Nordstrom's spring sale is brimming with great fashion and beauty deals; from denim staples to pastel shoes, these 20 are the ones we're eyeing.
text: Mango Julia Asymmetric Trench Coat A trench coat is a tried-and-true springtime staple, but this cropped, asymmetric version pays homage to tradition and feels slightly more fresh. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLarroudé Ricky Block Heel Boot Knee-high boots are year-round wardrobe classics, but come spring, they look especially chic worn with a shorter hemline sans tights. Anastasia Beverly Hills Natural & Polished Deluxe Eyebrow Kit Whether you’re a longtime fan or new to the Anastasia Beverly Hills brow game, this cult-favorite product line is a must buy. Bonus: All four shades are on sale.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFerragamo Gancini Oval Sunglasses Inject a bit of personality into your everyday look with these Ferragamo sunnies that are somehow both modern and retro. Favorite Daughter The Nikki Mid Rise Barrel Jeans The barrel jean trend lives on for spring. This pair caught our eye with its sleek silhouette and versatile wash. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSporty & Rich Vendome Pleated Cotton MiniskirtA little bit prep school, a little bit tennis-chic, this pleated skirt is a great pick for the sportswear-inspired wardrobe. Might as well get a polo shirt while you’re at it…Desmond & Dempsey Signature Cotton Knit Pajama Set While Desmond & Dempsey is known for its energetic prints, the brand also takes comfort just as seriously. This breathable set is crafted from 100 percent cotton. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAlex Mill Soho Vest A waistcoat is ideal for transitioning your wardrobe to spring. Layer a tee under this vest for crisper days and switch to the sleeveless look once temperatures begin to rise. Aeyde Darya Pump Aside from being charming (and a great option for brides), these low-heel pumps are incredibly comfortable. The mini bow is just icing on the cake.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBode Chatham Beaded Merino Wool & Cashmere CardiganWho wouldn’t want to take the opportunity to incorporate a crafty piece from Bode into their closet? This beaded cardigan is a charming conversation starter.FRAME The Patch Pocket Denim Jacket Polished yet laidback, this denim jacket does it all. Wear it with your favorite jeans for a fuss-free pairing, or toss it over a crisp shirt and knit skirt for work.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBenefit Cosmetics Big Time Brow Minis SetAnother cult-favorite beauty pick, this set includes both the pencil and setting gel to give your brows a fluffy, lifted look. Vince Pintuck Pleat Crop Flare Pants We’re saying “yes” to the kick flare pants trend this spring, and this pair from Vince feels especially distinct. The pebble hue combined with the flattering pintuck pleat will have us reaching for these on a weekly basis. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMansur Gavriel Square Toe Ballerina Flat Ballet flats will never go out of style, especially when they’re crafted in the most perfect shade of pale pink with a ladylike bow at the toe. No notes!Paloma Wool Drari Folded Waist MiniskirtWho doesn’t love a little hip bone action? This sleek skirt does all the work with a subtle-but-unique fold-down detail; just add a minimalist top and sandals to finish off your look. Advertisement - Continue Reading Belowrag & bone Belize Basketweave Shopper This embossed leather shopper is the perfect size for everyday errand-running, finished off in the trendiest color du jour. Salomon Speedcross 3 Gore-Tex® Waterproof SneakerLook around, and you’re likely to spot a Salomon sneaker in the wild—no matter where you are. This label offers quality-made, technical shoes that still manage to fit in with the cool crowd—buy now before these inevitably sell out.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFaithfull the Brand Corbiere Linen Vest This is the kind of linen blouse that justifies an afternoon picnic spent nibbling on fresh fruits and catching up on your latest good read. Cecilie Bahnsen Olympia Floral Appliqué Silk SkirtThis one goes out to the Cecilie Bahnsen girls. The brand’s signature whimsy is on full display with this textural skirt that would look exceptionally cool styled with a plain white tee.
html:
Mango Julia Asymmetric Trench Coat

A trench coat is a tried-and-true springtime staple, but this cropped, asymmetric version pays homage to tradition and feels slightly more fresh.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Larroudé Ricky Block Heel Boot

Knee-high boots are year-round wardrobe classics, but come spring, they look especially chic worn with a shorter hemline sans tights.

Anastasia Beverly Hills Natural & Polished Deluxe Eyebrow Kit

Whether you’re a longtime fan or new to the Anastasia Beverly Hills brow game, this cult-favorite product line is a must buy. Bonus: All four shades are on sale.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Ferragamo Gancini Oval Sunglasses

Inject a bit of personality into your everyday look with these Ferragamo sunnies that are somehow both modern and retro.

Favorite Daughter The Nikki Mid Rise Barrel Jeans

The barrel jean trend lives on for spring. This pair caught our eye with its sleek silhouette and versatile wash.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sporty & Rich Vendome Pleated Cotton Miniskirt

A little bit prep school, a little bit tennis-chic, this pleated skirt is a great pick for the sportswear-inspired wardrobe. Might as well get a polo shirt while you’re at it…

Desmond & Dempsey Signature Cotton Knit Pajama Set

While Desmond & Dempsey is known for its energetic prints, the brand also takes comfort just as seriously. This breathable set is crafted from 100 percent cotton.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Alex Mill Soho Vest

A waistcoat is ideal for transitioning your wardrobe to spring. Layer a tee under this vest for crisper days and switch to the sleeveless look once temperatures begin to rise.

Aeyde Darya Pump

Aside from being charming (and a great option for brides), these low-heel pumps are incredibly comfortable. The mini bow is just icing on the cake.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bode Chatham Beaded Merino Wool & Cashmere Cardigan

Who wouldn’t want to take the opportunity to incorporate a crafty piece from Bode into their closet? This beaded cardigan is a charming conversation starter.

FRAME The Patch Pocket Denim Jacket

Polished yet laidback, this denim jacket does it all. Wear it with your favorite jeans for a fuss-free pairing, or toss it over a crisp shirt and knit skirt for work.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Benefit Cosmetics Big Time Brow Minis Set

Another cult-favorite beauty pick, this set includes both the pencil and setting gel to give your brows a fluffy, lifted look.

Vince Pintuck Pleat Crop Flare Pants

We’re saying “yes” to the kick flare pants trend this spring, and this pair from Vince feels especially distinct. The pebble hue combined with the flattering pintuck pleat will have us reaching for these on a weekly basis.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mansur Gavriel Square Toe Ballerina Flat

Ballet flats will never go out of style, especially when they’re crafted in the most perfect shade of pale pink with a ladylike bow at the toe. No notes!

Paloma Wool Drari Folded Waist Miniskirt

Who doesn’t love a little hip bone action? This sleek skirt does all the work with a subtle-but-unique fold-down detail; just add a minimalist top and sandals to finish off your look.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

rag & bone Belize Basketweave Shopper

This embossed leather shopper is the perfect size for everyday errand-running, finished off in the trendiest color du jour.

Salomon Speedcross 3 Gore-Tex® Waterproof Sneaker

Look around, and you’re likely to spot a Salomon sneaker in the wild—no matter where you are. This label offers quality-made, technical shoes that still manage to fit in with the cool crowd—buy now before these inevitably sell out.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Faithfull the Brand Corbiere Linen Vest

This is the kind of linen blouse that justifies an afternoon picnic spent nibbling on fresh fruits and catching up on your latest good read.

Cecilie Bahnsen Olympia Floral Appliqué Silk Skirt

This one goes out to the Cecilie Bahnsen girls. The brand’s signature whimsy is on full display with this textural skirt that would look exceptionally cool styled with a plain white tee.
